name: phisguard-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for phishing detection and security analysis using PhisGuard backend

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run package
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.version:bump: npm version patch && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:bump:major: npm version major && npm run sync-version
scripts.sync-version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const fs=require('fs'); const manifest=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./chrome-extension/manifest.json')); manifest.version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('./chrome-extension/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2)); console.log('Manifest version synced to', pkg.version);"
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:extension"
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npm run dev:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:dev

author: PhisGuard Team
